steps.title: Psoriasis Area Photo
steps.text: In this activity, we'd like you to select the area on your body which is currently the most representative of your psoriasis, then take a photo of it to track over time.

steps.title: Most representative area
steps.text: Select the area that is the most representative of your psoriasis. This will be an area that you will photograph to track your psoriasis over time.

steps.title: Tap an area that best represent your psoriasis
